description:
The 765 idols land themselves a mini-concert at a summer event! All of them are excited because it`ll be the first time in a while they all get to perform together and they even get to sing. They all head towards the village where they`re going to perform with high hopes, but when they arrive, they find themselves deep in the mountains, in a village with an extremely rural feel. The youth organization that comes to greet them, filled with men, only further amplifies Yukiho`s stage fright...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everything Starts with One Courageous Step
Subete wa Ippo no Yuuki kara
すべては一歩の勇気から
